questions.question: Confirm the Equipment with the image placed below.
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar code again.
Check and confirm is there any physical damage of the equipment.
prepare a Damage / Incident and Missing report.
Switch on the Equipment and confirm the Equipment is getting ON.
check and confirm whether the wall outlet is provided with AC Voltage of 230V.
shift the equipment to another place where the AC Voltage 230V is provided
check the power cord cable for continuity as shown in the video and confirm whether it is defective or not.
the power cord cable is defective replace it with the new one
check and confirm the input AC module for any cracks, bent pins or rust.
replace the Transformer / N Module
open the equipment as shown in the below video and plug in the power cord, check and confirm whether the transformer output is provided.
replace the transformer / N module with the new one
plug in the power cord cable, and check the capacitor C3 across the A module and confirm whether it is delivering 6.2 V to 6.8 V.
replace the A module with the new one and confirm whether the problem still persist.
replace the E module

confirm whether a battery and power cord symbol appears when power cable is plugged in and unit / equipment does not switch ON.confirm whether a battery and power cord symbol appears when power cable is plugged in and unit / equipment does not switch ON.
replace the keypad with the new one
kindly set the flow rate and confirm whether the piston is moving.
open the equipment as shown in the video and confirm whether there any obstructions / broken gears.
replace the gears with the new one / clean the obstructions
replace the motor assembly with a new one
confirm whether the ml of syringe is detected and displayed.
kindly replace the senser near the drive board
If the problem has not yet solved, contact the Technical Team for any other assistance through video call.
Thanks
